actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.

official_title: Concurrent resolution providing for the acceptance of a statue of the late Senator Ernest Gruening presented by the State of Alaska for the National Statuary Hall collection.

summary.text: Accepts a statue of the late Senator Ernest Gruening presented by the State of Alaska for the National Statuary Hall collection. Authorizes the State of Alaska to temporarily place such statue in the rotunda of the Capitol and hold ceremonies there on that occasion. Directs the Joint Committee on Printing to print such proceedings as a Senate document, and directs that 5,000 additional copies of such document be printed.

titles.title: Concurrent resolution providing for the acceptance of a statue of the late Senator Ernest Gruening presented by the State of Alaska for the National Statuary Hall collection.
